Biraj Bhattarai is a Research Associate at NCCS. He is interested in understanding cognitive processing in neuro-communication disorder, specifically aphasia. His research utilizes neuroimaging technology like fNIRS to assess neural correlates of cognition, language, and related functions in persons with aphasia.
He is a doctoral student at Louisiana State University.
